TopicTitle: Hey look, i did a youtube!

Articles.Content:
I was going to mention myself on From's official forums but theyre a bit...garbage at the moment. No sepeeration of anything really so; here's another person playing games on camera (super original idea isn't it?)

Its mostly Dark Souls II at the moment but naturally there'll be new stuff added over time.
I`m playing and DS2 myself now - this game is frustrating lol. Nice vids and good commentary.
Good to hear positive comments, I'm pretty bad at the game it IS a blind playthrough i might add. very vague ideas where to go, a few times ive had a friend suggest a direction to go.
I cant really give you any usefull tips- playing DS2 blind too. I finished DS1 yesterday after more than 100h - amazing, amazing game!

More 'bad' because I never know what to level up or anything, and being blind i'll probably miss a lot. I do plan on a secondary series after the fact though for pvp of various flavors with different covenants, and i'll go find everything useful beforehand. Unrelated but I do plan on doing some Hearthstone stuff too after Naxxramas comes out.
Nice videos for a start up account. I've seen start up accounts where they recorded games on their phone, ew.
Ugh, I know. I've seen some pretty bad things, i made sure to at least start on a good footing. Bought a Blue Yeti mic and such
